firstSection.description: Gataca Wallet is an ID wallet in your phone than can store tamper-proof identity credentials securely, and lets you easily prove who you are when accessing online services
firstSection.title: A master key to the Internet

list.description: Credentials are physically stored in your phone, where only you can access your data - not even us! You can finally decide who you share your information with and when to revoke access permissions
list.title: Protect your privacy and take control of your data

list.description: Carry all your important documents with you in the form of portable verifiable credentials without the need to carry paper-based originals or rely on notarization services
list.title: Access and prove the authenticity of your personal information anytime, anywhere

list.description: Get the best and most secure user experience for onboarding and sign-in processes. You simply scan a QR code with your Gataca Wallet, consent to the required data for identity verification, and are in
list.title: Passwordless access to online services

thirdSection.description: Take charge of your digital identity

list.description: Securely store all your identity credentials, certificates, and personal documents
list.title: Request and store verifiable credentials

list.description: Securely share necessary identity information in a matter of seconds
list.title: Single Sign-On to digital services

list.description: Easily control and revoke your data permissions anytime
list.title: Manage access to your data

list.description: Create and store identity credentials  of your own
list.title: Add self-attested credentials

thirdSection.title: Features
